offer_summary.job_title: Freelance Senior RoR Developer with JS
offer_summary.location: remote work - Nabari district, Russian Federation
offer_summary.job_description: We are looking for Senior RoR Developer with JS and experience with email technologies like Mailgun or SparkPost. Required skills: Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, email technologies. We offer: 100% remote work, flextime & flexplace, dev-friendly processes, long-term collaboration.
requirements: At least 5 years' experience and advanced knowledge of Ruby and Ruby on Rails development.
Solid basics of JavaScript (experience with Ember.js would be beneficial).
Experience with email technologies like Mailgun or SparkPost would be beneficial.
Worked closely with clients and maintained positive relationships with them.
A high sense of responsibility and accountability for work.
Strong problem solving skills, curiosity to dig deep, debug and solve issues.
Knowledge of English (C1), spoken and written.
